EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2017.Snooze You Lose 9-6-2017
EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne Platform Ticket Prices Increase Next Week
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-finalpricecliff-q317]]> brings together the people, process, and tools for delivering and operating software and services.
Don't miss key talks <[[https://springoneplatform.io/sessions?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-finalpricecliff-q317]]> from leading Spring and Cloud Foundry committers as they showcase how to transform current IT practices, roles, and responsibilities using cloud-native applications. Learn and share with startups and enterprises leveraging modern Java with Spring connecting all the pieces of the modern software puzzle from developer, operator, architect and data scientist to executive.
You'll learn about:
- Reactive Programming
- Look-aside Caching
- Machine Learning - Event-driven Architectures - Site Reliability Engineering - Orchestrated Data Microservices - Serverless Technologies
Ticket prices increase in just 10 days. Save $200 when you register today <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/ehome/s1p/registration?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-finalpricecliff-q317]]>!
We hope to see you there, The SpringOne Platform Team
